name: Performing status derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Performing status from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET PRFRMNG_STTS = 
      CASE
        WHEN PRFRMNG_STTS = 1 
        OR FNNCL_ASST_INSTRMNT_TYP_CRR_123 = 28
        THEN 1
        ELSE 11
      END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_PRTY_IL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 1 
        OR BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.FNNCL_ASST_INSTRMNT_TYP_CRR_123 = 28
        THEN 1
        ELSE 11
      END;
